name: Socialike
description:
Socialike provides a unique strategic and analytic approach to your social media outreach beyond the scope of simple Facebook/Twitter updates. We are an all-encompassing boutique agency that sets itself apart by merging the offline and online identities. 
How We Help
Facebook Ads - Socialike effectively combines organic Facebook ads and interests to garner consistent traffic and the highest possible ROI to your website/social media pages.
 

Blogs - Socialike reaches out the many blogs and authors in our database who cover/mention similar companies as yours to ensure press for your company, making announcements and new products reach your consumers in a way that is more grassroots than it is force-fed. With this, Socialike will serve as your Social Media PR rep.

Reports/Analytics - Socialike will provide your company with regular reports on your company's social media presence and we will create specific deliverables and milestones to allow you to understand the effectiveness of our social media campaigns and tie this to improved ROI.
